term.title: assay

item.text: A set of operations having the object of determining the value of a quantity. In analytical chemistry, this term is synonymous with measurement.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2016 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
